name: playercount_185_225_233_110_30015
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vrising_server_query_api.
Tool description: This API is designed to query any VRising game server for information, more unique and custom features coming soon!
API description: Gets the player count from a server given its IP and port using the V Rising Server Query API.

port.description: The port number of the server.

ip.description: The IP address of the server.
